description: A man, asleep in his bed at night, is having a vivid dream depicted above his head. The dream features a brass band comprised of figures with unusual, cone-shaped and bucket-like head coverings playing instruments. His distressed expression and posture indicate the dream is causing him discomfort despite being about a musical performance. An open newspaper on the floor titled "CONCERT TOMORROW NIGHT" suggests the dream is a manifestation of anxiety or anticipation regarding an upcoming concert. This creates an ironic scenario where the expectation of enjoying music leads to a surreal and disturbing nocturnal experience.
